member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapTool.BuildHistogramChangeSpaceNameCmd(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a DisplayMethod to be used as the content of a parent image record's subrecord. When the parent image record is displayed by a CogRecordDisplay, the subrecord will cause a transform to be renamed in the Display's UserPixelTree.

member.summary: Creates a DisplayMethod to be used as the content of a parent image record's subrecord. When the parent image record is displayed by a CogRecordDisplay, the subrecord will cause a transform to be added to the Display's UserPixelTree.

member.summary: Draws a vertical line to mark a notable height locations in the histogram graphics.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapTool.CreateGraphicRecord(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a record that contains all the graphic elements needed to set up the tool, independently from the CurrentRecordEnable settings.
member.returns: A record with the graphic elements needed to set up the tool

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapTool.OutputImage
member.summary: Gets the output image from the last call to the Run method. A new instance of ICogImage is created for each run of the tool.
member.value: The output image. This is a CogImage8Grey or CogImage16Grey object which will be null if the last call to Run() failed.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapTool.RunParams
member.summary: Gets or sets the CogPixelMap operator used by this tool.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapTool.Region
member.summary: Gets or sets the optional region that specifies a portion of the input image to be used during pixel mapping. The property specifies exactly how this region will be applied to the InputImage.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapTool.InputImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the input image that is to be mapped.
member.exception: If the supplied input image is not CogImage8Grey or CogImage16Grey.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapTool.LastRunRecordDiagEnable
member.summary: Enable creation of records by bitwise ORing the appropriate CogPixelMapLastRunRecordDiagConstants.
member.value: A bitwise combination of CogPixelMapLastRunRecordDiagConstants. Options include None, InputImageDeepCopy, InputImageByReference, and All.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapTool.LastRunRecordEnable
member.summary: Enable creation of records by bitwise ORing the appropriate CogPixelMapLastRunRecordConstants.
member.value: A bitwise combination of CogPixelMapLastRunRecordConstants. Options include None, OutputImage, and All.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapTool.CurrentRecordEnable
member.summary: Enable creation of records by bitwise ORing the appropriate CogPixelMapCurrentRecordConstants.
member.value: A bitwise combination of CogPixelMapCurrentRecordConstants. Options include None, InputImage, Region, Histogram, ReferencePoints, RawMappingFunction, FinalMappingFunction and All.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapTool
member.summary:
This class provides tool level access to the
operator. This class encapsulates all of the classes needed to perform CogPixelMap image mapping.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.SetupRange16(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Setup a range in the the internal 16 bit lookup-table. The mapped values between the start and the end of the range will be linearly interpolated from outMin to outMax.
member.param: The start of the range to be initialized.
The end of the range to be initialized.
The mapped value at the start of the range.
The mapped value at the end of the range.

member.summary: Setup a range in the the internal 8 bit lookup-table. The mapped values between the start and the end of the range will be linearly interpolated from outMin to outMax.
member.param: The start of the range to be initialized.
The end of the range to be initialized.
The mapped value at the start of the range.
The mapped value at the end of the range.

member.summary: Setup the internal 16 bit lookup-table for the CogPixelMap object.

member.summary: Serialization constructor for CogPixelMap object.

The standard StreamingContext argument.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.Execute(Cognex.VisionPro.ICogImage,Cognex.VisionPro.ICogRegion)
member.summary: Perform pixel mapping on the supplied image.
member.returns: The mapped image. This image will have the grey value pixel depth specified in the OutputDepth property.
member.param: The image to be segmented.

An optional region. May be null. If supplied, this region is used to limit the amount of processing performed on the input image. The region mode is always PixelAlignedBoundingBox. If no inputRegion is supplied, the entire input image is processed.
member.exception: If the supplied input image argument is not a CogImage8Grey or CogImage16Grey.
If the supplied input image argument is null.
If the supplied input image depth is smaller than the output image depth.
If MappingMode is CogPixelMapMappingModeConstants::Quantize and NumQuantizeBins is larger than the max. number of output grey values.
If MappingMode is CogPixelMapMappingModeConstants::Interpolate and the reference points list is invalid.
If licensing for this operator cannot be confirmed.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.ComputeMapping(Cognex.VisionPro.ICogImage,Cognex.VisionPro.ICogRegion)
member.summary: Computes a set of reference points using the ComputMapParams properties, InputImage and Region and replaces the reference points in the list if necessary.
member.param: The input image to be processed (CogImage8Grey, CogImage16Grey or CogImage16Range)

An optional region. May be null. If supplied, this region is used to limit the amount of processing performed on the input image. The region mode is always PixelAlignedBoundingBox. If no inputRegion is supplied, the entire input image is processed.
member.para: If the user has specified any points in the reference points list, this function will replace the points. The result of the calling ComputMapping method is a set of reference points: 2 points computed in CVT that indicate the beginning and end of the linear ramp and VisionPro will add 2 other points to reflect the full range mapping of input image to full range of output image. For CogImage16Range, the pixels that are “visible” and “care” are used in CVT to compute the histogram from which the reference points are derived.
member.exception: If the supplied input image argument is not a CogImage8Grey, CogImage16Grey or CogImage16Range.
If the supplied input image argument is null.
If the supplied input image depth is smaller than the output image depth.
if region is outside image.
if any of the ComputeMapParams do not apply or outside boundaries of the range image in or out.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.EnforceReferencePointsOrder
member.summary: Sorts the reference points for a monotonically increasing order of their input values.
member.event: Fires when the order of reference points in the list changes.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.ValidateReferencePointsOrder(System.Int32@)
member.summary: Validates the reference points for a monotonically increasing order of their input values.
member.param: The index of the first invalid reference point, if any, -1 otherwise.
member.returns: True if all points are valid, false otherwise

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.ResetQuantized(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes the reference points to reflect a quantized full range mapping of the input grey value range to the output grey value range. Creates a stairway function with the specified number of steps.
member.param: The number of steps on the stairway function.
member.event: Fires when the number of reference points changes.
Fires when any reference point value changes .
member.exception: If numBins is less than 2 or greater than maxOutGrey / 2

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.ResetLinear(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes the reference points to reflect a linear full range mapping of the input grey value range to the output grey value range. Creates a number of equally spaced reference points.
member.param: The number of reference points to create.
member.event: Fires when the number of reference points changes.
Fires when any reference point value changes .
member.exception: If numPts is less than 2 or greater than maxOutGrey / 2

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.ResetLinear
member.summary: Initializes the reference points to reflect a linear full range mapping of the input grey value range to the output grey value range. Creates two referene points at relative locations (0,0) and (1,1)
member.event: Fires when the number of reference points changes.
Fires when any reference point value changes.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.ClearReferencePoints
member.summary: Deletes all reference points
member.event: Fires when the number of reference points changes.

member.summary: Gets the absolute output value of an existing reference point.

member.exception: If the index is negative or >= the number of reference points

member.summary: Sets the relative input value for an existing reference point.

If inputVal is outside the range of [0,1] inclusive.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.SetReferencePointAbsolute(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the absolute values for an existing reference point.
member.param: The index of the reference point.
The absolute input value for the reference point. It must be in the range of [0,maxInGrey] inclusive.
The absolute output value for the reference point. It must be in the range of [0,maxOutGrey] inclusive.
member.exception: If the index is negative or >= the number of reference points.
If inputVal is outside the range of [0,maxInGrey] inclusive.
If outputVal is outside the range of [0,maxOutGrey] inclusive.
member.event: Fires when the input value or the output value of the reference point. changes.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.SetReferencePoint(System.Int32,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the relative values for an existing reference point.

The relative input value for the reference point. It must be in the range of [0,1] inclusive.
The relative output value for the reference point. It must be in the range of [0,1] inclusive.
member.exception: If the index is negative or >= the number of reference points.
If inputVal or outputVal are outside the range of [0,1] inclusive.
member.event: Fires when the input value or the output value of the reference point. changes.

member.summary: Removes a reference point from the internal list.

member.event: Fires when the number of referenmce points changes.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.AddReferencePointAbsolute(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds a reference point to the internal list. The new reference point will be inserted so that the input values of all reference points are kept in increasing order. If a reference point with the same input value already exists, the new one will be added immediately before that reference point.
member.param: The absolute input value for the reference point. It must be in the range of [0,maxInGrey] inclusive.
The absolute output value for the reference point. It must be in the range of [0,maxOutGrey] inclusive.
member.event: Fires when the number of referenmce points changes.
member.exception: If inputVal is outside the range of [0,maxInGrey] inclusive.
If outputVal is outside the range of [0,maxOutGrey] inclusive.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.AddReferencePoint(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds a reference point to the internal list. The new reference point will be inserted so that the input values of all reference points are kept in increasing order. If a reference point with the same input value already exists, the new one will be added immediately before that reference point.
member.param: The relative input value for the reference point. It must be in the range of [0,1] inclusive.
The relative output value for the reference point. It must be in the range of [0,1] inclusive.
member.event: Fires when the number of reference points changes.
member.exception: If inputVal or outputVal are outside the range of [0,1] inclusive.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.SetInputDepth(Cognex.VisionPro.ICogImage)
member.summary: Sets the input bit depth. The conversion between absolute and relative ReferencePoint input values will be based on this value.
member.param: The image the inputDepth is derived from.
member.exception: If the image is not a CogImage8Grey or CogImage16Grey.
member.event: Fires when the imput depth changes.

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.GetInputDepth
member.summary: Gets the input bit depth. The conversion between absolute and relative ReferencePoint input values is based on this value.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.NumReferencePoints
member.summary: Gets the number of configured reference points.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.NonVisiblePixelValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the NonVisiblePixelValue.
member.value: The NonVisiblePixelValue. Default is 0. Applies only to CogImage16Range. Used to map invisible pixels when NonVisiblePixelValue set to false. The value must be between 0 and 65535 and a runtime error will occur if the value specified is outside the maximum for the output depth specified.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.UseDefaultNonVisiblePixelValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the UseDefaultNonVisiblePixelValue.
member.value: The UseDefaultNonVisiblePixelValue. Default is true. Applies only to CogImage16Range. When set to true, any invisible pixel value will be mapped to the first output map value. When set to false, map the invisible pixels to NonVisiblePixelValue

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.AutoComputeEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets the AutoComputeEnabled value. Compute with each run
member.value: AutoComputedEnabled value. Default is true for newly constructed object and false when de-persisting an older object from VisionPro 8.1 or earlier.
member.para: When set to true: The setter will call ComputeMapping(). The ComputMapping() will be called whenever a different image is set on the tool The ComputeMapping() will be called whenever a property in the ComputeMapParams has changed. The Execute() will always call ComputeMapping() first When set to false: The pixel map is in custom mode. The user defines their reference points. The Execute() will only apply the mapping

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.OutputInverted
member.summary: Gets or sets the OutputInverted value used for lookup table creation.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.OutputOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the OutputOffset value used for lookup table creation.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.OutputScale
member.summary: Gets or sets the OutputScale value used for lookup table creation.
member.exception: If newVal is less than 0.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMap.OutputDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets the bit depth of the output image.
member.exception: If new value is not a valid member of CogPixelMapImageDepthConstants.

member.summary: Gets or sets the ComputeMapParams
member.para: Holds the parameters that will be used whenever ComputeMapping() is called. When de-persisting an older object from VisionPro 8.1 or earlier, a new default constructed instance will be created.
member.exception: If the input argument is null.

member.exception: If newVal is less than 0

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapComputeParams.LowStdDevMultiplier
member.summary: Gets or sets LowStdDevMultiplier. The Low standard deviation multiplier in the range of (-HUGE_VAL, 0). Used only if the Algorithm is MeanStdDev.
member.exception: If newVal is greater than 0

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapComputeParams.HighTailFraction
member.summary: Gets or sets HighTailFraction. The High tail fraction is in the range [0, 1]. Used only if algorithm is Tails
member.exception: If newVal is not within 0 and 1

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapComputeParams.LowTailFraction
member.summary: Gets or sets LowTailFraction. The Low tail fraction is in the range [0, 1]. Used only if algorithm is Tails. It is the fraction of the sum of all the histogram bins that should be contained in the histogram range [0, LowTailFraction]
member.remarks: The low tail fraction and high tail fraction must be less or equal to 1. As you increase the low tail, the high tail will decrease if combined the value is greater than 1, and as you decrease the low tail, the high tail will increase if the combined value is greater than 1.
member.exception: If newVal is not within 0 and 1.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapComputeParams.Output2Fraction
member.summary: Gets or sets Output2Fraction. Specifies the second relative output pixel value used in the mapping. Used only if OutputRange is SpecifiedRelative
member.value: The Output1Fraction value. Default is 1. The value is relative between 0 and 1.
member.exception: If newVal is less than 0 or greater than 1.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapComputeParams.Output1Fraction
member.summary: Gets or sets Output1Fraction. Specifies the first relative output pixel value used in the mapping. Used only if OutputRange is SpecifiedRelative
member.value: The Output1Fractuon value. Default is 0. The value is relative between 0 and 1.
member.exception: If newVal is less than 0 or greater than 1

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapComputeParams.HighPadFraction
member.summary: Gets or sets HighPadFraction. The fraction of the initially-computed input range added to the initially-computed value of second map value. This value is typically positive
member.exception: If newVal is less than 0.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapComputeParams.LowPadFraction
member.summary: Gets or sets LowPadFraction. The fraction of the initially-computed input range added to the initially-computed value of first map value. This value is typically negative.
member.exception: If newVal is greater than 0.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapComputeParams.OutputRange
member.summary: Gets or sets the OutputRange. Specifies the output range used in the mapping.
member.value: The OutputRange value. Default is Full.
member.exception: If newVal is out of range.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapComputeParams.Algorithm
member.summary: Gets or sets the algorithm value used to compute the pixel map. Specifies the algorithm used to compute the input range that will be mapped to the output range.
member.value: The algorithm value. Default is Tails.
member.exception: If newVal is out of range.

member.summary: Finalize this CogPixelMapComputeParams.

member.summary: Destruct this CogPixelMapComputeParams.

member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by HightTailFraction may have changed.

member.summary: This class represents the operator for the CogPixelMap tool. It holds all the data required to do a PixelMap operationwhen Auto mode is used.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapOutputRangeConstants
member.summary: Enumeration of constants used to specify the computed output range

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapOutputRangeConstants.CustomRelative
member.summary: Use user-specified values

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapOutputRangeConstants.FullInverted
member.summary: Use the maximum and minimum values of the range of the output type (e.g. 256 and 0 for 8-bit output images)

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapOutputRangeConstants.Full
member.summary: Use the minimum and maximum values of the range of the output type (e.g. 0 and 256 for 8-bit output images)

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapAlgorithmConstants
member.summary: Enumeration of constants used to specify the algorithm to use to compute the mapping. The algorithm dictates which histogram statistics is performed and how the reference points are selected

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapAlgorithmConstants.TypeRange
member.summary: Use the minimum and maximum values of the range of the input type (e.g. 0 and 65536 for 16-bit input images) to fill the output range. Note that the "proper" mapping of, e.g., the full 16-bit range to the full 8-bit range is a shift by 8 bits (or, equivalently, a division by 256), which implies that the correct mapping is from 65536 to 256, rather than from 65535 to 255

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapAlgorithmConstants.MeanStdDev
member.summary: Use the mean minus a multiple of the standard deviation and the mean plus a (possibly different) multiple of the standard deviation to fill the output range

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapAlgorithmConstants.Tails
member.summary: Use the low tail and high tail in the histograms statistics of the input image to fill the output range

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapAlgorithmConstants.MinMax
member.summary: Use the minimum and maximum values in the histogram statistics of the input image to fill the output range

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapLastRunRecordDiagConstants
member.summary: Enumeration of diagnostic data that can be provided in the Tool's LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapLastRunRecordDiagConstants.All
member.summary: Include all of the diagnostic data in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapLastRunRecordDiagConstants.Region
member.summary: Include a copy of the region in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapLastRunRecordDiagConstants.InputImageDeepCopy
member.summary: Include a deep copy of the input image in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapLastRunRecordDiagConstants.InputImageByReference
member.summary: Include a reference to the input image in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapLastRunRecordDiagConstants.None
member.summary: Do not include any of the diagnostic data in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapLastRunRecordConstants
member.summary: Enumeration of non-diagnostic data that can be provided in the Tool's LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapLastRunRecordConstants.All
member.summary: Include all of the non-diagnostic data in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapLastRunRecordConstants.OutputImage
member.summary: Include the last run's OutputImage in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapLastRunRecordConstants.None
member.summary: Do not include any of the non-diagnostic data in the LastRunRecord.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapCurrentRecordConstants
member.summary: Enumeration of data that can be provided in the Tool's CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapCurrentRecordConstants.All
member.summary: Include all possible records in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapCurrentRecordConstants.HistogramStatistics
member.summary: Specifies whether the histogram statistics will be added (if enabled) in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapCurrentRecordConstants.LogarithmicHistogram
member.summary: Specifies whether a linear or logarithmic histogram will be drawn (if enabled) in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapCurrentRecordConstants.FinalMappingFunction
member.summary: Include the static final mapping function graph in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapCurrentRecordConstants.RawMappingFunction
member.summary: Include the static raw mapping function graph in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapCurrentRecordConstants.ReferencePoints
member.summary: Include the reference points (interactive CogPointMarker) in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapCurrentRecordConstants.Histogram
member.summary: Enables drawing of the Histogram graph in the CurrentRecord. The LinearHistogram setting specifies whether a linear or logarithmic histogram will be drawn.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapCurrentRecordConstants.CoordinateAxes
member.summary: Include the coordinate axes in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapCurrentRecordConstants.Region
member.summary: Include the (interactive) region to be used for mapping in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapCurrentRecordConstants.InputImage
member.summary: Include the input image in the CurrentRecord.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro.PixelMap.CogPixelMapCurrentRecordConstants.None
member.summary: Do not include any records in the CurrentRecord.
